title: Make transfers visible from account/show page
notes:
The account/show page currently displays account information, balances, and schedules, but doesn't show the actual transfers that have occurred. Users should be able to see a list of transfers (both pending and posted) related to the account to understand the transaction history and current balance.

This would involve:
- Adding a transfers section to the account/show view
- Loading transfer data in the accounts controller
- Displaying transfer details (amount, date, other account, status)
- Possibly adding filtering/pagination for accounts with many transfers
